member.name: M:CMS.EcommerceProvider.CMSPayPalProvider.ConfirmPayment(System.Collections.Specialized.NameValueCollection)
member.summary: Confirms payment - post the data that was posted to the merchant back to PayPal and returns PayPal response as result of payment confirmation. Returns "VERIFIED" - payment data match, "INVALID" - payment data don't match.
member.param: Name-Value collection with the data that was posted to the merchant by PayPal

member.summary: Compares payment data (seller email, total price, payment currency) to order data and returns appropriate error message if data don't match, otherwise returns empty string.
member.param: Name-Value collection with the payment data that were posted to the merchant by PayPal

member.summary: Shopping cart current step index.

member.name: P:CMS.EcommerceProvider.ShoppingCart.PreviousStepIndex
member.summary: Previous step index. (Set it if you want to load another step with index different from CurrentStepIndex - 1).

member.name: P:CMS.EcommerceProvider.ShoppingCart.NextStepIndex
member.summary: Next step index. (Set it if you want to load another step with index different from CurrentStepIndex + 1).

member.name: P:CMS.EcommerceProvider.ShoppingCart.ButtonBack
member.summary: Button 'Back' - you need to override this property to get access to shopping cart 'Back' button in shopping cart steps.

member.name: P:CMS.EcommerceProvider.ShoppingCart.ButtonNext
member.summary: Button 'Next' - you need to override this property to get access to shopping cart 'Next' button in shopping cart steps.

member.summary: Shopping cart container.

member.summary: Page url, we should return to after "Continue shopping" button is clicked.

member.summary: Shopping cart current step control.

member.summary: Payment gateway provider instance.
